briefTitle: A Safety and Efficacy Study of ADS-5102 in Patients With Multiple Sclerosis and Walking Impairment
officialTitle: A Multicenter, Open-Label Safety and Efficacy Study of ADS-5102 Amantadine Extended Release Capsules in Patients With Multiple Sclerosis and Walking Impairment
summary: This study assessed the long-term safety and tolerability of ADS-5102 in subjects with MS and walking impairment who had completed the double-blind, placebo-controlled study of ADS-5102 in subjects with MS (ADS-AMT-301).

primaryOutcome.measure: Number of Patients With Adverse Events
primaryOutcome.timeFrame: Through study completion, an average of 1 year.
